feed.title: Google Cloud: Generative AI on Vertex AI
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Generative AI on Vertex AI

entry.content:
Updated pricing for Vertex AI Agent Engine: Starting on November 6, 2025, Vertex AI Agent Engine Runtime will start charging for runtime usage for the following regions:

  • asia-southeast1 (Singapore)
  • australia-southeast2 (Melbourne)
  • europe-west2 (London)
  • europe-west3 (Frankfurt)
  • europe-west4 (Netherlands)

For more details, see Pricing for Vertex AI Agent Engine.
entry.summary: Vertex AI Agent Engine runtime usage will be charged starting November 6, 2025, in select regions including Singapore, Melbourne, London, Frankfurt, and Netherlands. For detailed information, please refer to the Vertex AI pricing page.
entry.title: Changed: Pricing Update for Vertex AI Agent Engine

entry.content: Access Transparency for Vertex AI Agent Engine: Access Transparency is now available for Vertex AI Agent Engine. For more information, see the overview for Enterprise security.
entry.summary: Access Transparency is now available for Vertex AI Agent Engine.
entry.title: Feature: Access Transparency for Vertex AI Agent Engine

entry.content:
Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (gemini-2.5-flash-image) is now generally available. This GA release includes support for additional image generation and editing features such as image generation from multiple reference images, improved multi-turn image editing, and support for batch predictions.

See Gemini 2.5 Flash Image for more information.
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image is now generally available, offering enhanced features like multi-reference image generation, improved multi-turn editing, and batch prediction support.
entry.title: Announcement: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Now Available

entry.content:
Google Gen AI SDK in C# Preview

Preview: The Google Gen AI SDK is available in C#. See googleapis/dotnet-genai.

This release includes support for GenerateContentAsync, GenerateContentStreamAsync, GenerateImagesAsync, and three Live APIs, which includes SendClientContentAsync, SendRealtimeInputAsync, and SendToolResponseAsync.
entry.summary: The Google Gen AI SDK is now available in C# as a preview. This SDK supports various content generation and real-time interaction features.
entry.title: Feature: Google Gen AI SDK in C# Preview

entry.content: DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp is available through Model Garden.
entry.summary: The DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp model is now accessible via Model Garden, offering new capabilities for your projects.
entry.title: Feature: DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp Now Available

entry.content:
New preview models for Gemini 2.5 Flash and 2.5 Flash-Lite are now available. These models are available at the following versioned endpoints:

  • gemini-2.5-flash-preview-09-2025
  • gemini-2.5-flash-lite-preview-09-2025
entry.summary: New preview models for Gemini 2.5 Flash and 2.5 Flash-Lite are now accessible through specific versioned endpoints.
entry.title: Announcement: New Gemini Models Available

entry.content: Access to Gemini's 1.5 models has been discontinued. For more information, see our Model versions page.
entry.summary: Access to Gemini 1.5 models has been discontinued. Please refer to the Model versions page for more information.
entry.title: Deprecated: Gemini 1.5 models access discontinued

entry.content:
Gemini 2.5 Flash with Live API Native Audio Preview

Gemini 2.5 Flash with Live API Native Audio (gemini-live-2.5-flash-preview-native-audio-09-2025) is available in Preview. A single, unified model processes audio input and generates audio output directly, eliminating separate text-to-speech/speech-to-text conversions. This results in-low latency, high-quality, and incredibly human-like conversations. New features and capabilities include:

  • Improved Barge-in: Interrupt Gemini more naturally and reliably, even in loud and noisy environments.
  • Robust Function Calling: We've improved the triggering rate, allowing Gemini to successfully execute the functions you define with greater precision.
  • Accurate Transcription: The accuracy of audio-to-text transcription has been significantly enhanced.
  • Seamless Multilingual Support: Speak to Gemini in multiple languages, and it will effortlessly switch between them without any pre-configuration. Language is no longer a barrier!
  • Enhanced Audio Quality: Experience a dramatically improved audio quality that truly feels like speaking with a person.
  • Proactive Audio: Define Gemini's expertise and set conditions for when it should respond. Gemini can act as a "silent listener," only chiming in when the conversation touches upon its designated area of expertise.
  • Affective Dialog: Gemini can adapt and adjust its generated voice to match the emotional tone of the speaker, creating more empathetic and natural interactions.

Watch our comprehensive demo to see these features in action, including seamless language switching, expert mode, emotionally aware responses, memory recall, and interactive screen sharing for engineering tasks – all demonstrated directly within Vertex AI Studio without writing a single line of code!
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash now supports native audio processing for low-latency, human-like conversations. Key features include improved barge-in, robust function calling, accurate transcription, seamless multilingual support, enhanced audio quality, proactive audio responses, and affective dialog for emotionally resonant interactions.
entry.title: Announcement: Gemini 2.5 Flash: Real-time Audio Conversations

entry.content: DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus is available through Model Garden.
entry.summary: The new DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus model is now accessible via Model Garden.
entry.title: Feature: DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus Now Available

entry.content:
Grounding with Google Maps

Grounding with Google Maps has implemented the following changes:

  • Removed the following fields from the API response:
  • grounding_chunk.maps.text
  • grounding_chunk.maps.place_answer_sources.review_snippets.author_attribution
  • grounding_chunk.maps.place_answer_sources.flag_content_uri
  • grounding_chunk.maps.place_answer_sources.review_snippets.flag_content_uri
  • The widget context token is only returned when the optional widget_token_enable input flag is set.

To learn more, see Grounding with Google Maps.
entry.summary: The Google Maps grounding feature has been updated. Several fields have been removed from the API response, and the widget context token is now only returned when the `widget_token_enable` flag is set.
entry.title: Changed: Google Maps Grounding Update

entry.content:
Imagen

We improved Imagen's virtual try-on model, virtual-try-on-preview-08-04, so that it is better at preserving the person's body shape and preserving the garment product's identity.
entry.summary: The Imagen virtual try-on model has been updated to better preserve body shape and garment identity.
entry.title: Changed: Imagen model update

entry.content:
Vertex AI Agent Engine

Agent Engine now supports the following features:

  • Agent Engine Code Execution, now in Preview, lets your agent run code in an isolated sandbox environment. For more information, see Code Execution.
  • You can now develop, deploy, and use agents that support the Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol on Agent Engine. For more information, see Develop an Agent2Agent agent.
  • Agent Engine now supports bidirectional streaming. For more information, see Bidirectional streaming.
  • The Agent Engine page in the Cloud Console UI now has a new Memory Bank tab for displaying and managing memories.
entry.summary: Vertex AI Agent Engine introduces exciting new capabilities including Code Execution for running code in a sandbox, support for the Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol, and bidirectional streaming. Additionally, a new Memory Bank tab is now available in the Cloud Console for managing agent memories.
entry.title: Feature: New Features for Vertex AI Agent Engine

entry.content:
Vertex AI Agent Engine

In version v1.112.0 of the Vertex AI SDK for Python, the agent_engines module has been refactored to a client-based design. For information about updating your existing code to the new design, see the Migration guide.
entry.summary: The Vertex AI SDK for Python has refactored its agent_engines module to a client-based design in version v1.112.0. A migration guide is available for updating existing code.
entry.title: Breaking: Vertex AI Agent Engine Update

entry.content: EmbeddingGemma and DeepSeek-V3.1 models are available through Model Garden.
entry.summary: Exciting news! The EmbeddingGemma and DeepSeek-V3.1 models have just been added to Model Garden. Explore these powerful new tools for your projects.
entry.title: Feature: EmbeddingGemma and DeepSeek-V3.1 Models Now Available

entry.content: AI Singapore's SEA-LION V4 models are available through Model Garden. They are open models for Southeast Asian languages, built by leveraging Vertex Model Development Service for enhanced training efficiency and model accuracy.
entry.summary: AI Singapore
entry.title: Feature: SEA-LION V4 Models Now in Model Garden

entry.content:
Veo video generation

Veo 3 support for short-duration videos is generally available. You can use Veo 3 to create 4, 6, or 8 second videos. For more information, see the following:

  • Generate videos with Veo on Vertex AI from text prompts
  • Generate videos with Veo on Vertex AI from an image
  • Veo on Vertex AI video generation API
entry.summary: Veo 3 now supports short-duration video generation. Create 4, 6, or 8 second videos using text or image prompts.
entry.title: Feature: Veo 3 Video Generation Now Available

entry.content:
Vertex AI RAG Engine: Managed Database (Spanner)

Customers will be charged for the use of a Google-managed Spanner instance that's provisioned in a Google tenant project, using standard Spanner SKUs.

For more information, see Vertex AI RAG Engine billing.
entry.summary: Spanner is now available as a managed database for the Vertex AI RAG Engine. Billing will follow standard Spanner SKUs.
entry.title: Changed: Vertex AI RAG Engine: Managed Database (Spanner)

entry.content:
Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview

Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview) is available in Preview. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview supports additional image generation and editing features such as image generation from multiple reference images and improved multi-turn image editing.
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image is now in preview, offering advanced image generation and editing capabilities.
entry.title: Announcement: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image

entry.content:
Vertex AI model tuning and Gen AI evaluation service

Vertex AI model tuning now supports integration with the Gen AI evaluation service in Preview. You can automatically run evaluations on your tuned models and intermediate checkpoints. For more information, see Create a tuning job.
entry.summary: New integration allows automatic evaluations of tuned models and checkpoints in Vertex AI.
entry.title: Feature: Vertex AI Model Tuning and Gen AI Evaluation

entry.content:
Vertex AI Agent Engine

Agent Engine now supports the following enterprise security features:

  • You can now deploy your agents in a private VPC environment, configuring a Private Service Connect interface, to ensure data privacy and meet security and compliance requirements. For more information, see Configure Private Service Connect interface.
  • You can now use your own customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK) to protect data at rest.
  • You can now specify customized resource controls, such as the minimum and maximum number of application instances, resource limits for each container, and concurrency for each container.
  • As a part of Vertex AI Platform, Vertex AI Agent Engine now supports HIPAA workloads.

For more information, see Agent Engine overview.
entry.summary: Introducing enhanced security for Vertex AI Agent Engine, now with private VPC deployment, customer-managed encryption keys, and customized resource controls. Additionally, it now supports HIPAA workloads as part of the Vertex AI Platform.
entry.title: Feature: Vertex AI Agent Engine Enhances Enterprise Security

entry.content:
Imagen

Imagen 4 is Generally Available.

Imagen 4 introduces the following models:

  • Imagen 4 Generate
  • Imagen 4 Fast Generate
  • Imagen 4 Ultra Generate

For more information, see Generate images using text prompts and Image generation API.
entry.summary: Imagen 4 is now available, featuring new models for image generation.
entry.title: Announcement: Imagen 4 Now Generally Available

entry.content: Gemma 3 270M, Wan 2.2 and Wan 2.1 models are available through Model Garden.
entry.summary: New models now available.
entry.title: Feature: Gemma 3 270M, Wan 2.2, and Wan 2.1 models are now accessible via Model Garden.

entry.content: OpenAI's gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b are available as Model as a Service (MaaS) models in Model Garden.
entry.summary: New models available.
entry.title: Feature: Feature

entry.content: Qwen3 Coder and Qwen3 235B are available as Model as a Service (MaaS) models in Model Garden.
entry.summary: Qwen3 Coder and Qwen3 235B are now available on Vertex AI's Model Garden.
entry.title: Feature: New Models on Model Garden

entry.content: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite and Gemini 2.5 Pro now support supervised fine-tuning. For more information, see About supervised fine-tuning for Gemini models.
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite and Gemini 2.5 Pro models now support supervised fine-tuning.
entry.title: Feature: New Fine-Tuning Support for Gemini Models

entry.content:
Vertex AI prompt optimizer

The Vertex AI prompt optimizer is now generally available. For more information, see Optimize prompts.

We now offer a zero-shot prompt optimizer.
entry.summary: Vertex AI prompt optimizer is now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Vertex AI prompt optimizer

entry.content:
Vertex AI Agent Engine

You can use your own custom service account for agent identity to manage permissions and access according to your organization's security policies.
entry.summary: This feature allows you to use your own custom service account for agent identity to manage permissions and access according to your organization's security policies.
entry.title: Feature: Vertex AI Agent Engine Custom Service Account

entry.content:
Model tuning

You can now perform supervised fine-tuning on open models such as Llama 3.1. For more information, see Tune an open model.
entry.summary: Supervised fine-tuning on open models like Llama 3.1 is now available.
entry.title: Feature: New: Open Model Tuning

entry.content: OpenAI's gpt-oss models are available through Model Garden.
entry.summary: OpenAI's models are now available via Model Garden.
entry.title: Feature: OpenAI Models on Model Garden

entry.content:
Imagen

Virtual try-on lets you generate virtual try-on images from an image of a person and product photos that you provide, and is available in Preview. For more information, see Generate Virtual Try-On Images and Virtual Try-On API.
entry.summary: Virtual try-on feature.
entry.title: Feature: Imagen Virtual Try-On

entry.content: Veo video generation Veo 3 and Veo 3 Fast are now generally available. For more information, see Generate videos using text prompts.
entry.summary: Veo 3 and Veo 3 Fast are now available.
entry.title: Announcement: Veo video generation now available

entry.content: Grounding with Google Maps is available in all regions (except for the EEA) as a Preview (Pre-GA) feature.
entry.summary: Grounding with Google Maps is now available in all regions (except EEA) as a Preview feature.
entry.title: Changed: Grounding with Google Maps Now in Preview

entry.content:
Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now generally available and accessible using the API and Vertex AI Studio. This GA release includes support for explicit caching and batch prediction, as well as expanded region support.

See Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite for more information.
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now generally available via API and Vertex AI Studio, featuring explicit caching, batch prediction, and expanded region support.
entry.title: Announcement: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite Now Generally Available

entry.content: Veo 3 preview models now support upscaling for 1080p resolution using the new resolution parameter. For more information, see Veo on Vertex AI.
entry.summary: You can now upscale videos to 1080p using the new 'resolution' parameter in Veo 3 preview models. This feature enhances video quality for a better viewing experience.
entry.title: Announcement: Veo 3 now supports 1080p upscaling

entry.content: Added Gemma 3 fine-tuning notebook using Axolotl docker with support for 1b, 4b, 12b, and 27b variants.
entry.summary: We have released a new fine-tuning notebook for Gemma 3. This notebook supports 1b, 4b, 12b, and 27b variants and uses the Axolotl docker.
entry.title: Feature: New Gemma 3 Fine-tuning Notebook Released

entry.content: Multimodal MedGemma 27B IT, MedSigLIP, and T5Gemma models are available through Model Garden.
entry.summary: The latest advancements in medical AI are now accessible via Model Garden, featuring MedGemma 27B IT for multimodal medical understanding, MedSigLIP for medical image analysis, and T5Gemma for text generation tasks.
entry.title: Feature: New medical AI models available in Model Garden

entry.content:
Vertex AI Agent Engine

Vertex AI Agent Engine Memory Bank is now available in Preview. Memory Bank lets you dynamically generate long-term memories based on users' conversations with your agent.
entry.summary: Memory Bank for Vertex AI Agent Engine is now available in Preview. This feature allows for dynamic generation of long-term memories from user conversations with your agent.
entry.title: Feature: Vertex AI Agent Engine Memory Bank now in Preview

entry.content:
Vertex AI Agent Garden

Vertex AI Agent Garden now supports filtering by tags.
entry.summary: You can now filter by tags in Vertex AI Agent Garden.
entry.title: Feature: Filter by tags in Vertex AI Agent Garden

entry.content: Gemma 3n models are now available through Model Garden.
entry.summary: The new Gemma 3n models are now accessible via Model Garden, offering advanced capabilities for various applications.
entry.title: Feature: Gemma 3n Models Now Available

entry.content: Multimodal datasets are now available in preview. For more information, see Multimodal datasets.
entry.summary: Preview of multimodal datasets is now available. You can find more information in the documentation regarding multimodal datasets.
entry.title: Feature: New feature: Multimodal datasets are available in preview

entry.content:
Starting on June 24, 2025, Imagen versions 1 and 2, image captioning, and visual question answering are deprecated.

On September 24, 2025, the following features and models will be removed:

  • image captioning
  • visual question answering
  • Imagen 1 model imagegeneration@002
  • Imagen 2 models imagegeneration@005 and imagegeneration@006

For more information, see Migrate to Imagen 3.
entry.summary: Imagen versions 1 and 2, image captioning, and visual question answering are deprecated starting June 24, 2025. These features will be removed on September 24, 2025. Please migrate to Imagen 3.
entry.title: Deprecated: Imagen versions 1 and 2 deprecated

entry.content: Veo 2 support for advanced video controls is Generally Available. In addition to a providing a first frame of a video, you can specify the last frame of a video or a video to extend in length. For more information, see Veo on Vertex AI API.
entry.summary: You can now use advanced video controls for Veo 2, including specifying the first and last frames, or extending video length. Learn more about Veo on Vertex AI API.
entry.title: Announcement: Veo 2 Advanced Video Controls Now Available

entry.content:
Gemini 2.5 Flash and Gemini 2.5 Pro are now generally available and accessible using the API and Vertex AI Studio.

See Gemini 2.5 Flash and Gemini 2.5 Pro for more information.
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash and Gemini 2.5 Pro are now available via API and Vertex AI Studio.
entry.title: Announcement: Gemini 2.5 Models Now Generally Available

entry.content:
Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now available as a preview offering in both the API and Vertex AI Studio.

See Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite for more information.
entry.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now available as a preview in the API and Vertex AI Studio. You can find more details on the Vertex AI website.
entry.title: Announcement: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite now in preview

entry.content:
Live API is now available as a private general availability offering in the API and Vertex AI Studio. Reach out to your Google account team representative to request access.

See Live API for more information.
entry.summary: Live API is now available as a private general availability offering in the API and Vertex AI Studio. Contact your Google account team to request access.
entry.title: Announcement: Live API now available

entry.content:
Preview endpoint availability and removal: All existing Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro preview endpoints (listed below) will continue to be available with their current preview pricing until July 15, 2025. After this date, these preview endpoints will be shut down.

  • gemini-2.5-flash-preview-04-17
  • gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20
  • gemini-2.5-pro-preview-03-25
  • gemini-2.5-pro-preview-05-06
  • gemini-2.5-pro-preview-06-05
entry.summary: All existing Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro preview endpoints will be shut down after July 15, 2025. Until then, they will remain available with current preview pricing.
entry.title: Deprecated: Gemini 2.5 preview endpoints to be shut down after July 15, 2025

entry.content: Updated pricing for Gemini 2.5 Flash GA: The price for Gemini 2.5 Flash in GA will be adjusted to reflect its quality and unified output token pricing. This includes lower prices for thinking output, higher prices for non-thinking output. These pricing changes will take effect on the new GA endpoint as shared above. Preview pricing will only continue on existing preview endpoints for 30 days post-GA on July 15, 2025.
entry.summary: Pricing for Gemini 2.5 Flash has been updated. This change affects output token pricing, with lower rates for thinking output and higher rates for non-thinking output. These new prices apply to the GA endpoint starting July 15, 2025. Existing preview endpoints will maintain preview pricing for 30 days after the GA launch.
entry.title: Changed: Gemini 2.5 Flash Pricing Update

entry.content: Provisioned Throughput (PT): Once a model is GA, all new PT purchases will be for GA endpoints only. If you've purchased PT for a specific preview version, it will still work for that specific preview. However, you must migrate the existing PT to the GA endpoint or purchase new PT for the GA endpoint by July 15, 2025.
entry.summary: Provisioned throughput for models that have reached general availability (GA) will be for GA endpoints exclusively. Existing provisioned throughput purchases for preview versions will remain functional for their specific preview versions. However, a migration of existing provisioned throughput to the GA endpoint or a new purchase for the GA endpoint is required by July 15, 2025.
entry.title: Changed: Provisioned Throughput Update

entry.content: Updated preview endpoints: Effective June 19, 2025, gemini-2.5-flash-preview-04-17 endpoint will serve the Gemini 2.5 Flash model version released on 05-20, which has been promoted to GA. Similarly, the gemini-2.5-pro-preview-05-06 and 03-25 endpoints will serve the Gemini 2.5 Pro model version released on 06-05, also promoted to GA. This update ensures continuity during your transition.
entry.summary: The Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro models have been updated to their General Availability (GA) versions. The preview endpoints will now serve the GA model versions, ensuring a smooth transition for users.
entry.title: Changed: Gemini Model Updates to General Availability

entry.content: The DeepSeek API service on Vertex AI is in Preview. For more information, see the DeepSeek model card in Model Garden.
entry.summary: The DeepSeek API is now available on Vertex AI as a preview feature. You can find more details about the DeepSeek model in Model Garden.
entry.title: Announcement: DeepSeek API now in Preview on Vertex AI Preview

entry.content:
Imagen 4's public preview models are updated to the following:

  • imagen-4.0-generate-preview-06-06
  • imagen-4.0-fast-generate-preview-06-06
  • imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-preview-06-06

For more information about each model, see Preview Imagen models.

To avoid service interruption, migrate from imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-exp-05-20 and imagen-4.0-generate-preview-05-20 before 2025-07-07.
entry.summary: The Imagen 4 public preview models have been updated. To prevent service disruptions, please migrate from the older `imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-exp-05-20` and `imagen-4.0-generate-preview-05-20` models before July 7, 2025.
entry.title: Changed: Imagen 4 Public Preview Models Updated

entry.content:
Gemini API

The logprobs and response_logprobs parameters for the Gemini API are now generally available. For more information, see Generate content with Gemini API.
entry.summary: The Gemini API now offers generally available logprobs and response_logprobs parameters, enhancing content generation capabilities.
entry.title: Changed: Gemini API logprobs now generally available

entry.content:
Gemini 2.5 Pro's public preview version has been updated to gemini-2.5-pro-preview-06-05 and includes expanded support for thinking. This model version is available in the API and Vertex AI Studio.

See Gemini 2.5 Pro for model details.
entry.summary: The public preview of Gemini 2.5 Pro has been updated to a new version, gemini-2.5-pro-preview-06-05. This update enhances reasoning capabilities and is accessible via the API and Vertex AI Studio.
entry.title: Feature: Gemini 2.5 Pro Update

entry.content: Model Garden now includes DeepSeek-R1-0528 variants.
entry.summary: DeepSeek-R1-0528 model variants are now available in Model Garden.
entry.title: Announcement: New Model Variants in Model Garden

entry.content:
In Model Garden, the following fine tuning features have been added:

  • Gemma 3 UI fine-tuning using PEFT docker.
  • Qwen 2.5 fine-tuning notebook using PEFT docker.
  • Qwen 3 fine-tuning notebook using Axolotl docker.
  • lm-evaluation-harness as an evaluation service in the Llama 3.3, Llama 3.1, Gemma 3 and Gemma 2 fine-tuning notebooks.
entry.summary: Model Garden has introduced new fine-tuning capabilities for several models, including Gemma 3, Qwen 2.5, and Qwen 3, with support for PEFT and Axolotl docker containers. Additionally, lm-evaluation-harness has been integrated as an evaluation service for Llama 3.3, Llama 3.1, Gemma 3, and Gemma 2 fine-tuning notebooks.
entry.title: Announcement: New Fine-Tuning Features in Model Garden
